source:
Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

#Create DataFrame for the stparcel LMS Table
stparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
stparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("stparcel")

#Create DataFrame for the stdeliverypickupcustomer LMS Table
stdeliverypickupcustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stdeliverypickupcustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
stdeliverypickupcustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("stdeliverypickupcustomer")

#Create DataFrame for the stbillcustomer LMS Table
stbillcustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stbillcustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
stbillcustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("stbillcustomer")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovolumiserlog  LMS Table
dbovolumiserlog = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbovolumiserlog.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovolumiserlog.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovolumiserlog")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovolumiserlocation  LMS Table
dbovolumiserlocation = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbovolumiserlocation.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovolumiserlocation.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovolumiserlocation")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
rptvolumiserloglevel
AS
SELECT

    p.lms_parcel_id
    ,CAST(coalesce(p.lms_parcel_barcode,dpa.parcelid) as varchar(128)) as lms_parcel_barcode
    ,p.lms_parcel_consignid
    ,bc.lms_customer_name as lms_parcel_orderbillcustname
    ,vl.dateupdated lms_volumiserlog_scandate
    ,(p.lms_parcel_volumiserlength / 10) as lms_parcel_volumiserlengthcm
	,(p.lms_parcel_volumiserwidth / 10) as lms_parcel_volumiserwidthcm
	,(p.lms_parcel_volumiserheight / 10)  as lms_parcel_volumiserheightcm
    ,p.lms_parcel_weight
    ,(((prevLength)*(prevWidth)*(prevHeight)) / 5000) as lms_volumiserlog_prevcalculatedvolumetricweightkg
    ,(v.newlength /10) as lms_volumiserlog_newlengthcm
	,(v.newwidth /10) as lms_volumiserlog_newwidthcm
	,(v.newheight /10) as lms_volumiserlog_newheightcm
    ,(v.newweight / 1000) as lms_volumiserlog_newweightkg
    ,((v.newlength /10)*(v.newwidth /10)*(v.newheight /10))/5000 lms_volumiserlog_newcalculatedvolumetricweightkg
    ,vloc.location as lms_volumiserlog_location
        
FROM dbovolumiserlog vl
LEFT JOIN stparcel p on p.lms_parcel_id = vl.parcelid
LEFT JOIN stbillcustomer bc on bc.lms_customer_id =  p.lms_parcel_orderbillcustid
LEFT JOIN dbovolumiserlocation vloc on vloc.volumiserid = vl.volumiserid

WHERE vl.dateupdated >= to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01')
